792: 
793: **Step 1: Shape-Regularity of the Delaunay Lattice**
794: 
795: :::{prf:lemma} Shape-Regularity with High Probability
796: :label: lem-shape-regularity
797: 
798: Under the equilibrium measure $\mu_{\text{inv}}$, the Delaunay triangulation satisfies the following geometric properties with probability $\geq 1 - Ce^{-cN}$ for some constants $C, c > 0$:
799: 
800: 1. **Bounded coordination**: Each node has at most $K$ neighbors, where $K$ depends only on $r_0, R_{\text{cut}}$
801: 2. **Edge length bounds**: All edges satisfy $r_{\min} \leq \|x_i - x_j\| \leq R_{\text{cut}}$

793: **Step 1: Shape-Regularity of the Delaunay Lattice**
794: 
795: :::{prf:lemma} Shape-Regularity with High Probability
796: :label: lem-shape-regularity
797: 
798: Under the equilibrium measure $\mu_{\text{inv}}$, the Delaunay triangulation satisfies the following geometric properties with probability $\geq 1 - Ce^{-cN}$ for some constants $C, c > 0$:
799: 
800: 1. **Bounded coordination**: Each node has at most $K$ neighbors, where $K$ depends only on $r_0, R_{\text{cut}}$
801: 2. **Edge length bounds**: All edges satisfy $r_{\min} \leq \|x_i - x_j\| \leq R_{\text{cut}}$
802: 3. **Simplex shape regularity**: All 4-simplices have aspect ratio (ratio of circumradius to inradius) bounded by a constant $\rho_{\max}$

hints.label: lem-strong-coupling-random
hints.title: Strong-Coupling Mass Gap for Shape-Regular Random Lattices
hints.content:
830: :label: lem-strong-coupling-random
831: 
832: **Sketch: expansion into full proof in progress (estimated 30-50 pages)**
833: 
834: Consider an ensemble of lattices with the following properties:
835: - Bounded coordination $K$
836: - Edge lengths in $[r_{\min}, R_{\text{cut}}]$
837: - Simplex aspect ratio $\leq \rho_{\max}$
838: - Plaquette area $\geq A_{\min}$
839: 
840: Then there exists a critical coupling $\beta_c = \beta_c(K, r_{\min}, R_{\text{cut}}, \rho_{\max}, A_{\min}) > 0$ such that for all $\beta_{\text{gauge}} < \beta_c$, the ensemble-averaged Wilson loop observables satisfy:
841: 
842: $$
843: \mathbb{E}_{\text{lattice}}\left[\langle W_C \rangle_{\text{gauge}}\right] \leq e^{-\Delta_{\text{eff}} \cdot \text{Area}(C)}
844: 
845: $$
